alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 4:58PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches in higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph into early this evening and Thursday afternoon and evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, highest across high terrain areas. * WHERE...South Central Utah. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
